text: Kampong Merimbun (Malay for Merimbun Village) is a village situated in the central part of Tutong District, Brunei, within the mukim of Rambai. The postcode for Kampong Rambai is TH1349. It is home to Tasek Merimbun, the largest natural lake in the country. == References == Merimbun
title: Kampong Merimbun
